title: Sr. Customer Service Manager - Golfer Care - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: Build and lead a team of Golfer Care Supervisors who will be recruiting, hiring, training and coaching a large group of Golfer Care Specialists. Coach Golf Care Supervisors in leadership skills; delivering our why and committing to the personal development of our next leaders
